system.descriptionText:
Wearer can make a -10 Tech-Use Test as a Half Action. If Successful one powered device within 15 metres overloads and fails, +1 per Degree of Success. If the device was a weapon, it instead gains the Overheats Weapon Quality.
Overheat: Attack roll of 91+ causes overheat, weapon must be dropped or does its damage to user with PEN 0, cools off next turn.

description.value: Wearer can make a -10 Tech-Use Test as a Half Action. If Successful one powered device within 15 metres overloads and fails, +1 per Degree of Success. If the device was a weapon, it instead gains the Overheats Weapon Quality. Overheat: Attack roll of 91+ causes overheat, weapon must be dropped or does its damage to user with PEN 0, cools off next turn.
